name: Costs for repair and renovation of science and engineering research space in academic institutions, by field and time of repair and renovation: FYs 2018–21
description: Costs for repair and renovation of science and engineering research space in academic institutions, by field and time of repair and renovation: FYs 2018–21

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_planned_to_start_in_fy_2020_or_fy_2021
variableMeasured.description: Planned To Start In Fy 2020 Or Fy 2021

variableMeasured.name: field_deferred_projects_included_in_institutional_plan
variableMeasured.description: Deferred Projects Included In Institutional Plan

variableMeasured.name: field_deferred_projects_not_included_in_institutional_plan
variableMeasured.description: Deferred Projects Not Included In Institutional Plan

notes: Fields of science and engineering and their disciplines were revised in FY 2015. Specifically, "Agricultural sciences and natural resources sciences" was split into "Agricultural sciences" and "Natural resources and conservation." Prior to FY 2015, data for "Natural resources and conservation" are included in "Agricultural sciences." Deferred projects are those that (1) are not funded and (2) are not scheduled for FY 2020 or FY 2021. Details may not add to totals due to rounding.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Science and Engineering Research Facilities.
